snippet.title: Hoppers Director, Producer & Story Team Explain How Pixar Went "Rogue" For Newest Plucky Heroine
snippet.description:
Hoppers director Daniel Chong, producer Nicole Grindle, story supervisor John Cody Kim, and story lead Margaret Spencer explain how they landed on their daredevil Pixar protagonist Mabel, and what the biggest changes were from development to release.

Hoppers arrives in theaters on March 6.
